name: AKINED
description:
Take control of Adam, an old man whos death is close and needs help escaping his self-made dungeon of traps and puzzles. To help him on his journey towards the exit, Adam can release his Spirit that have the power of Possession, which will enable it to control objects in the environment.

How to play

Mouse - Navigate in menus and go through dialogues.
WASD - Moving around
Spacebar - Jumping (as Adam)
E - Release Spirit (as Adam)/Return to Adam (from Spirit)/Return to Spirit (from Possessed object)
Q - Possess object (as Spirit)
F - Interact with objects (as Adam & Spirit)

Details

Team: 4 people (2 designers, 2 project managers)
My role: Main programmer & level designer
Duration: 4 weeks
Engine: Unity

All trademarks and assets are property of their respective owners.

Personal notes:

My first game project made during my education at FutureGames in Skellefteå, Sweden. The assignment was to create a 3D Puzzle Platformer game in 4 weeks using the Unity game engine. Initially we were 6 people in the group but both of our programmers quit the education, so I had to take on the role of programmer, and in the end wrote the majority of our code used in the project.

Our small group managed to win 2/4 awards (Community-Choice and Best-In-Show) in our presentation at school, where both students and professional game developers voted.
